trips.title: Doi Pha Hom Pok National Park
trips.price: 300 THB for foreigners, 150 THB for children
trips.detail: A popular winter destination in Fang District. The mountains are often covered in mist, creating a stunning atmosphere. The weather is cold and windy, so warm clothing is recommended.

trips.title: Fang Hot Spring
trips.price: 20 THB entrance, 100 THB per pair for foot soaking
trips.detail: A natural hot spring with water temperatures ranging from 40–88°C. Activities include boiling eggs, soaking feet, and mineral baths. Camping and park accommodation are available.

trips.title: Doi Ang Khang
trips.detail: Famous for Nang Phaya Suea Krong flowers that bloom in January, creating a beautiful pink tunnel along the mountain road.

trips.title: Wat Phra That Chaloem Phrakiat
trips.detail: Cultural attractions You can come and pay homage and ask for blessings from the Sangkhachai Buddha image. and the white jade Guan Yin For auspiciousness in life The temple area also has shady places suitable for recreation. Meditate or practice Dhamma You can also see the beautiful scenery of Mon Pin Subdistrict.
